mapper.select: SELECT c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.ceo_name ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt FROM company c JOIN contract t ON c.company_code = t.company_code

SELECT t.contract_no ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt ,t.month_pay_price ,t.total_pay_price ,t.contract_state ,c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.company_tel ,c.company_business_number ,c.company_type ,c.company_address ,c.company_post ,c.ceo_email FROM contract t JOIN company c ON t.company_code = c.company_code WHERE c.company_code = #{companyCode}
